metadata.title: CVE-2019-6286 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In LibSass 3.5.5, a heap-based buffer over-read exists in Sass::Prelexer::skip_over_scopes in prelexer.hpp when called from Sass::Parser::parse_import(), a similar issue to CVE-2018-11693.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6286` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
